title: Consistently getting kicked from game
body:
Ever since I got back to playing league since the recent patch, I find myself (without fail) getting kicked from the game every game and having to reconnect.  Fortunately this only happens once per game and within the first 15 minutes of the game.  Still, this is all kinds of annoying and need a definitive solution here.  Strangely enough when I go do a custom game to practice cs, I never get disconnected.

I've tried the following already:
Ran the Hextech Tool
Used a WiFi extender
Directly connect to WiFi extender via ethernet cable
Release/Renew IP and Flush DNS

Things I can't/will not do:
Move my entire setup upstairs to where the router is.  I much prefer it staying in my room.
Port Forwarding: My router is one supplied by Optimum.  Going into the port forwarding section of the routing screen only allows inputting of individual ports and not port ranges.

replies.body:
While WiFi is convenient, it's problematic for games like League that rely **heavily** on a steady stream of packets with consistent latency. You may need to temporarily move your setup to confirm whether or not this is an issue with your network adapter or with the router itself.

Regardless, working through the steps in our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) is a good start in troubleshooting this. Let me know if they caused any change.
